meanings.definition: Fails to achieve success or reach potential.
meanings.sent1: He underachieves in school by not studying enough.
meanings.sent2: She consistently underachieves in her sports competitions.
meanings.sent3: The lazy cat underachieves in catching mice.
meanings.sent4: The old car underachieves in speed compared to the new models.
meanings.sent5: The plant underachieves in growth due to lack of sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The team underachieves in the match despite their strong lineup.
meanings.sent2: He often underachieves at work because he lacks motivation.
meanings.sent3: The comedian underachieves in making the audience laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The phone underachieves in battery life compared to other models.
meanings.sent5: The student underachieves in the exam due to lack of preparation.
